JPN:
Welcome to the room of the
Beginning and End!

I've been watching the stars,
and knew you would join us.
May I please have your name?

Okay, and what month were
you born in?

In my opinion, you look like
this don't you?

What school do you want
to go to?

Without further ado let's
go through the door.

I'm sure you'll be a great
magician...

You want to make your own
decisions, don't you?

You'll have to decide for
yourself.

Ho-ho... You're the type who's
a hard worker.

That's what I would expect
from the star
sign of<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Broom<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho... You're the type who's
a bit creative yes?

That's what I would expect
from the star
sign of<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Whirler<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho... You're the type who
can't say no.

That's what I would expect
from the star
sign of<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Witches Nose<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho... You're the type who's
a natural born leader.

That's what I would expect
from the star
sign of<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Bat's Wings<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho... You're the type who's
responsible.

That's what I would expect
from the star
sign of<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Little Pot<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho...　You're the social type,
Aren't you?

That's what I would expect
from the star sign of
<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Lips<CMD>008027000180</CMD>.

Ho-ho...　You're the sensitive type,
Aren't you?

That's what I would expect
from the star sign of
<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Heart<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho...　You're the type
who likes to have fun aren't you?

That's what I would expect
from the star sign of
<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Big Pot<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho...　You're the type
who's studious and lucritive yes?

That's what I would expect
from the star sign of
<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Scale Tail<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho...　You're the type
who's sensitive and polite yes?

That's what I would expect
from the star sign of
<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Staff<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho...　You're the inquisitive type
who's likes to know.

That's what I would expect
from the star sign of
<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Hat<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

Ho-ho...　You're the clever type
aren't you?

That's what I would expect
from the star sign of
<CMD>008027000480</CMD>The Skull<CMD>008027000180</CMD>

You came here to be a
magician, didn't you?

Now then...
Tell me your gender.
Are you sure of your answer?

Okay...
Let's get you ready
and enrolled!

Well, that's too bad...
come back when you've
change your mind.
Okay... Let me ask you again...

Okay, I think I figured out
where you're going.
I can't give you this name.

I thought you looked like
this in my memory, but...

Is this the correct name
for your school?

I know exactly where you're
going with this.

Your data transfer has been
completed. You may proceed to
that doorway.

I'm sure you'll become
a great magician.

Can you tell me what
you're singing about?
